description: Masks will also need to be worn in most indoor places, as Italy tries to stem a rise in infections.
title: Coronavirus: Masks made mandatory outdoors across Italy
title_page: Coronavirus: Masks made mandatory outdoors across Italy - BBC News
maintext: "From now on, masks and protective gear have to be brought with us when we leave our house and worn. We have to wear them all the time unless we are in a situation of continuous isolation," he said.
